data.name: AnEnterpriseGradeSoftwareSystem
data.value: Isistimu Yesofthiwe Yezinga Lebhizinisi Yomkhakha Wezolimo Wesimanje

data.name: AgriEnergyConnectDescription
data.value: I-Agri-Energy Connect iyisistimu yebhizinisi esezingeni eliphezulu, esekelwe kuwebhu, eklanyelwe ukusebenza njengemakethe emaphakathi yomkhakha wezolimo. Inika amandla abalimi ngokubanikeza amathuluzi aqinile okuphatha imikhiqizo yabo, kuyilapho ibaxhumanisa nenethiwekhi ebanzi yabasebenzi nababambiqhaza. Le platform yenza ukuxhumana okungenazihibe, ukuphathwa kwedatha okusobala, nokuzibandakanya komphakathi, iqhube ukusebenza kahle nokukhula kwabo bonke abasebenzisi.

data.name: ProductFarmerManagementDescription
data.value: Ukusebenza okugcwele kokudala, ukufunda, ukubuyekeza, nokususa (CRUD) kwamaphrofayili abalimi nohlu lwemikhiqizo yabo.

data.name: CommunityForumDescription
data.value: Iforamu yokuxhumana yababalimi nabasebenzi ukuze bazibandakanye, babuze imibuzo, futhi babelane ngolwazi, ephelele nezimpendulo nokulinganisela.

data.name: RoleBasedAccessControlDescription
data.value: Isistimu yokuqinisekisa nokugunyaza evikelekile ehlukanisa phakathi kwezindima zoMlimi noMsebenzi, iqinisekise ukuthi abasebenzisi bafinyelela kuphela ezicini ezifanele.

data.name: AuditLoggingDescription
data.value: Imikhondo yokucwaninga ebanzi futhi ehlungekayo erekhoda imicimbi ebalulekile yesistimu ukuze kuvikelwe, kuhambisane nomthetho, futhi kuxazululwe izinkinga.

data.name: AjaxLocalizationDescription
data.value: Ukushintsha ulimi okungenazihibe, okungadingi ukuvuselela ikhasi, phakathi kwesiNgisi, isiBhunu, nesiZulu ukuze kube nokuhlangenwe nakho komsebenzisi okuphakeme, okungaphazamiseki.

data.name: ModernUIAccessibilityDescription
data.value: Isixhumi esibonakalayo esiphendulayo, esikhangayo ngokubukeka, esigxile kakhulu ekufinyelelekeni (ARIA, WCAG) ukuqinisekisa ukusetshenziswa yibo bonke.

data.name: EnterprisePrinciples
data.value: I-platform yethu yakhelwe phezu kwezimiso eziyinhloko zebhizinisi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iqinile, ithembekile, futhi ilungele imisebenzi ebalulekile yebhizinisi:

data.name: ScalabilityDescription
data.value: Yakhelwe phezu kohlaka lwe-ASP.NET Core olusebenza ngezinga eliphezulu, isistimu yakhelwe ukusingatha ukukhula kwabasebenzisi nedatha ngempumelelo.

data.name: SecurityDescription
data.value: Isebenzisa i-ASP.NET Core Identity ukuze kuqinisekiswe nokuqinisekiswa okuqinile, okulekelelwa ukugcinwa kwamarekhodi okucwaninga okuningiliziwe ukuze kulandeleke ngokugcwele.

data.name: ReliabilityMaintainabilityDescription
data.value: Ukuhambisana nezimiso ze-SOLID nokusetshenziswa kwamaphethini wokuklama amisiwe kuholela kukhodi ehlanzekile, elungisekayo, futhi ehlolwayo.

data.name: AccessibilityDescription
data.value: Ukuzibophezela okuphelele ekufinyelelekeni, okuhlanganisa izimpawu zendawo ze-ARIA, i-HTML enenjongo, nomklamo onokugqama okuphezulu ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo ezihlukahlukene zabasebenzisi.

data.name: DesignPatternsIntro
data.value: Ukwakheka kwesistimu kusekelwe kumaphethini wokuklama afakazelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuhlukaniswa okucacile kwezindaba kanye nesakhiwo esiguquguqukayo, esisekelwe ezingxenyeni:

data.name: MVCDescription
data.value: Iphethini eyinhloko yokwakha ehlukanisa umqondo wohlelo lokusebenza, idatha, nokwethulwa, ekhuthaza ukuthuthukiswa okuhlelekile nokuhambisanayo.

data.name: RepositoryPatternDescription
data.value: Ihlukanisa umqondo webhizinisi kusendlalelo sokufinyelela kudatha, ivumele imisebenzi yedatha eguquguqukayo futhi ehlolwayo.

data.name: ObserverPatternDescription
data.value: Inika amandla indlela yokushicilela nokubhalisa yokuphathwa kwemicimbi, idale isistimu ehlukanisiwe lapho izingxenye zingasabela khona ekushintsheni kwesimo ngaphandle kokuncika okuqondile. Lokhu kuboniswa bukhoma ngezansi.

data.name: DependencyInjectionDescription
data.value: Isetshenziswa kakhulu kulo lonke uhlelo lokusebenza ngesitsha sesevisi esakhelwe ngaphakathi se-ASP.NET Core ukuphatha ukuncika nokukhuthaza ukuhlangana okuxekethile.

data.name: LiveObserverDemoDescription
data.value: Le demo ibonisa ukuthi izingxenye eziningi (isibonisi sesimo kanye ne-logger) zisabela kanjani ekushintsheni kwesimo kusuka emthonjeni owodwa ngaphandle kokuxhunyaniswa ngokuqondile.

data.name: DevelopmentApproachDescription
data.value: Le phrojekthi yathuthukiswa kusetshenziswa indlela yokusebenza ephindaphindayo nekhulayo, eholwa yizimiso ze-agile. Sigxile ekuletheni izingxenye ezisebenzayo ngezigaba, sivumela impendulo eqhubekayo nokucwengwa. Le ndlela igcizelele ikhwalithi yekhodi, ukuhambisana nemikhuba emihle, nokuzibophezela ekwakheni umkhiqizo wokugcina oqinile futhi ogxile kumsebenzisi.
